response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to both of us. Considering its significance and the benefits it would bring to you, I propose a purchase price of $950,000. This offer reflects a strategic midpoint between its intrinsic worth to me and its perceived value to you. I believe this price presents an excellent opportunity for both parties to achieve a fair transaction. Please let me know if you require any additional information or if you wish to discuss this further.", "product_price": 950000}
